Question: In the 2018 movie 'Bhaiaji Superhit', why does Don Lal Bhaisahab Dubey seek the services of Goldie Kapoor?
Options:
A. To help him write a script
B. To facilitate his dream of seeing himself on the big screen
C. To produce a film
D. To cast actors for his movie
Answer: To facilitate his dream of seeing himself on the big screen

Question: In the 2018 movie 'Bhaiaji Superhit', why does Don Lal Bhaisahab Dubey seek the services of Tarun Porno Ghosh?
Options:
A. To help him write a book
B. To assist in a heist
C. To fulfill his dream of seeing himself on the big screen
D. To direct a movie
Answer: To fulfill his dream of seeing himself on the big screen

Options:
A. Don Lal Bhaisahab Dubey
B. Varanasi
